Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/ Evans
ShortDescription: Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Evans, 130th, Ellis and Indiana, due to street blockage near 131st/ Evans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Evans, 130th, Ellis and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st/ Evans.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
